title: Magic Type Detail Template
description: Details a specific type of magic within a system -- its effects, limitations, interactions with other types, practitioners, and cultural perception. Multiple magic types should be distinct in rules, limits, and practitioner requirements.

prerequisites.description: What is needed to practice this type

effects.description: What this magic type can do

interaction_with_other_types.description: How it interacts with other magic types

practitioner_title.description: What practitioners of this type are called

source_of_power.description: Where this type draws power from

rarity.description: How rare this type of magic is -- rarity makes it more valuable and feared (source: V3 Ch6 line 7095-7097)

rarity_factors.description: Why this type is rare or common -- talent availability, material rarity, danger level, spell book availability

good_evil_axis.description: Whether this type is considered white (beneficial), black (harmful), grey, or neutral magic

cultural_perception.description: How society views this type of magic

associated_deity.description: If associated with a specific deity

x-cross-references.magic-system-overview: This type belongs to a magic system
x-cross-references.spell-design: Spells of this type are designed using the Spell Design Template
x-cross-references.god-profile: May be associated with a deity
